title: What If Every Team Had Their Own Marcus Smart? | The Answer
description:
Chris and Seerat start by discussing the reports of racism and misogyny within Robert Sarver’s Phoenix Suns organization (0:50). Then they discuss Damian Lillard after a story comes out detailing his meeting with LeBron James and Anthony Davis in the offseason (22:15). Lastly they answer the core question of the episode: What if every team had their own Marcus Smart (37:42)?

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Seerat Sohi
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
